name: My Pet Rock (itch) (TinyTroglodyte)
description:
Controls: WASD to move the car, ARROW KEYS to move the pet rock. R to restart

(This game can be played in singleplayer or local multiplayer where one person controls the car and the other the rock)

My Pet Rock is a game about Bill, who wants to take his pet rock for a walk. Unfortunately, because his beloved best friend is so heavy, he can't take him around using conventional methods, he'll have to try a different way... 

Made during the 48 hour GMTK Game Jam 2021. There will be some bugs due to this and unfortunately we couldn't add everything we wanted in that build  (Most noticeably the lack of a health system) including many extra cars that were modelled and in engine, just never implemented , but we had a lot of fun during development! 

Developers:
Jlectric: Programmer https://github.com/Jlectric
Oliver Keys: Art       www.artstation.com/oliverkeys

 Updates Coming Soon!
